---
title: "The GitHub Development Team"
date: "Updated: `r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
---

```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)

myfiles <- list.files(pattern = "^about-.*html$")
coders <- c()
semester <- c()
for (f in myfiles){
    rfile <- paste(c(sub(pattern="(about-.*\\.)html", replacement = "\\1", f), "Rmd"), collapse="")
    mymeta <- rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter(rfile)
    if (! is.null(mymeta$semester)) {
        semester <- c(semester, mymeta$semester)
    } else {
        semester <- c(semester, "&nbsp;")
    }
    ghuser <- sub(pattern = "about-(.*)\\..*$", replacement= "\\1", f)
    mylink <- paste(c("[", ghuser, "](", f, ")"), collapse = "")
    coders <- c(coders, mylink)
}
mydata <- data.frame(coders, semester)
colnames(mydata) <- c("The Coder Pages", "Semester")
kable(mydata)
```
